title: Next Champ should be a water bender.
body:
Air Bender = YASUO
Fire Bender = Annie
Earth Bender = Taliyah 
Water Bender = ???

replies.body:
I'd just like a water mage rather than support.  I feel like it could be difficult to design going purely with water.  It could need to extend to other forms of water (like fog).

Edit: to all those saying "Nami," she doesn't work as a mage mid.  There's no reason for them to not have 2+ champions who manipulate water (just look at how many ice champions they have...).
Nami And Fizz are fish not humanoid benders of water

Then you should wrote the title of the post 

Next Champ should be a human water bender.  

It would be less confusing to people

Air Benders {{champion:40}} and {{champion:157}} (maybe {{champion:85}})

Fire Benders {{champion:1}}  and {{champion:63}} (maybe {{champion:102}})

Earth Benders {{champion:163}}  and {{champion:143}} (maybe {{champion:54}}) 

Water Benders {{champion:267}}  and ?

Am I the only one seeing a trend here

We need a full team of each element

Lightning users are firebenders know your Avatar
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
I lost access to the show after the 6th or 7th episode (lost power for 4 months) and haven't  got around to watching it again

Ah well if you have time I'd really recommend seeing it through.  You can find it lots of places for free online.

Great story, IMO.

(Legend of Korra isn't quite as good though)
I think she should be a fish, or a mermaid! Lets name her uh.... Nami?

At first glance I read that as, "the next champion should be a water bottle"
lol

may this one can not be human?
like a Eel, or a Shark, or a whale (which is a mammal :D)
I'd like to see league do more animal champions

> [{quoted}](name=x9 After Game,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=x4W2RNeB,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-03T23:33:44.321+0000)
>
> Syndra
> DUH

Syndra is not a water bender. She as a skin that makes her look like one, but she isn't.

Water {{champion:267}} {{champion:105}} Earth {{champion:163}} {{champion:54}} Fire {{champion:1}} {{champion:63}} Air {{champion:40}} {{champion:157}} 
Long ago, the ~~four nations~~ **different ELOS** lived together in harmony. Then, everything changed when the ~~fire nation~~ **Smurfs**  attacked. Only the ~~Avatar~~ **GODYR** , master of all ~~four elements~~ **elo boosting techniques**, could stop them, but when the world needed him most, he ~~vanished~~ **DCd**. A hundred ~~years~~ **ranked games** passed and my ~~brother~~ **duo partner** and I discovered the new ~~Avatar~~ **GODYR**, a ~~airbender~~ **boosted animal** named ~~Aang~~ **Nightblue3**. And although his ~~airbending~~ **ELO-boosting** skills are great, he has a lot to learn before he's ready to ~~save~~ **boost** anyone. But I believe ~~Aang~~ **Nightblue3** can save the ~~world~~ **scrubs**.
